Detailed Description

Private USB device interface.

Implements USB device communications

Function Documentation

int estrella_usb_find_devices ( dll_list_t *  devices  ) 

Find USB devices

If necessary firmware upload and reenumeration is being performed transparently.

TODO: I have a bit of a bad feeling about pushing this firmware to every cypress chip around. Other manufacturers are eventually using the same IC and bad things will happen if we throw a wrong firmware at it. Don't know if we could work with serial number or something.

So maybe it would be a better idea to provide a simple EPP2000 firmware loading tool. The user could then decide on his own to load firmware to /proc/bus/usb/foo/bar if he's sure it's a EPP2000 device.

Anyway, since the USB LPT adapter cable is the only cypress device on my USB bus I'll stick with the automatic firmware uploading for now.

Parameters:
devices An initialized dll_list_t which is to be populated with found devices
Returns:
ESTROK No errors occured

ESTRERR Device discovery failed

)

Initialize a usb connected device

Parameters:
session Pointer to a session which is to be bound to the supplied usb device
dev Device to be used in this session
Returns:
ESTROK No errors occured

ESTRINV A supplie dinput argument is invalid

ESTRERR Device initialization failed

int estrella_usb_close ( estrella_session_t *  session  ) 

Close a usb device session

This basically just detaches from libusb. Which is important because it frees the device for use in another session

Parameters:
session Session to detach the usb device from
Returns:
ESTROK No errors occured
